channel.title: Monster Agression
channel.description:
Hi im almost done my source and client ... and i really dont remember how to make monsters NOT agressive and NOT attack u in a non multy attack zone because some of the monsters in my source will pille you but its not multy attack and i dont want them agressive
Help a newb out plox :)
